metadata.title: Drayage Coordinator Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for Drayage Coordinator positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven professional with over 6 years of experience in managing short-distance port and rail transportation logistics. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing performance.

experience.title: Senior Drayage Coordinator
achievements: Efficiently coordinated over 500 drayage movements per month, ensuring timely deliveries with a 98% on-time rate.
Implemented a new TMS software that reduced operational costs by 15% and improved service levels.
Developed partnerships with key carriers, leading to negotiated contracts that reduced freight costs by 10%.

experience.title: Drayage Coordinator
achievements: Successfully managed a portfolio of 15 client accounts, providing tailored solutions to meet specific logistical needs.
Optimized drayage routes which resulted in a 20% reduction in transit times and better resource allocation.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve communication flows and enhance operational transparency.

experience.title: Junior Drayage Coordinator
achievements: Assisted in the management of daily drayage operations, contributing to a 15% increase in efficiency.
Compiled and analyzed data to support senior management in strategic planning and operational decision making.
Played a key role in onboarding new clients, ensuring a seamless integration into logistics processes.

projects.name: Drayage Optimization Project
projects.description: Led a project to implement a process improvement initiative that increased load efficiency by 25% through effective route optimization and resource management.
